Our Partners in Circular Innovation

Supplying Clean, High-Quality Materials for Remanufacturing and Sustainable Product Development

At PV Industries, we don't just recycle solar panels — we unlock their value for the future.

Through our advanced solar panel processing and material recovery systems, we supply clean, high-grade raw materials to innovative partners who remanufacture these materials into new products. Together, we are building a robust circular economy for Australia's solar industry and beyond.

Our Materials Become a Partner

Materials We Provide

Clean Glass

High-quality glass suitable for remanufacturing

Refined Aluminium

Clean aluminium ready for secondary processing

Silicon

Recovered silicon for industrial applications

Copper & Metals

Electrical components and wiring materials

Steel & Framing

Structural materials for construction use

Framework and support systems

Let's Build a Circular Economy Together

Whether you need a consistent supply of high-grade recycled materials or want to collaborate on circular product innovation, PV Industries is your trusted partner.

We believe in partnerships that create environmental, economic, and technological value—for your business, for Australia, and for the planet.

Why Partner With Us

Certified Clean Materials

Industry-leading processing technology delivers contaminant-free materials

Consistent Supply

National collection network ensures reliable material availability

Environmental Impact

Reduce reliance on virgin resources and support circular economy goals

Strategic Collaboration

Active R&D partnerships for innovative product development

What Our Partners Say

Working with PV Industries gives us access to quality materials we can trust. Their transparency, consistency, and sustainability credentials make them a standout supplier.

Tom R. Circular Product Manufacturer

Their clean glass and aluminium inputs have helped reduce our production costs while boosting our sustainability metrics. A great partner in the circular economy space.

Sandra P. Building Materials Company Director
